author: Xbox
description:
SLEEP AWAKE is launching on Xbox Series X|S December 2, 2025. In the last known city on Earth, people are disappearing in their sleep. Those who remain exist in a crisis of reckless experiments to keep awake. You must navigate depraved death cults, otherworldly forces, and the ever-present horror of The HUSH, to save yourself and those who rely upon you.

SLEEP AWAKE is developed by EYES OUT and published by Blumhouse Games. 

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/sleep-awake/9PF3T0M4HK95

author: Xbox
description:
"This is strange… it doesn’t feel right.”

The veil lifts once more. Step into the unnerving world of Cthulhu: The Cosmic Abyss. A first look at the game’s in-engine world, where every corridor hums with hidden movement and every flicker of light hints at something watching.

Experience the tension, the beauty, and the dread of a world that should not exist.

Cthulhu: The Cosmic Abyss is coming Xbox Series X|S on April, 16th 2026.

author: Xbox
description:
Play the definitive edition of Fallout 4. It’s been ten years since players first stepped out of Vault 111 and into the post-nuclear world. To mark the occasion, Bethesda Game Studios is thrilled to announce Fallout 4: Anniversary Edition. This is the ultimate celebration of a beloved classic, bringing together the complete Fallout 4 experience on November 10th!

This special release includes the base game and the six official add-ons: Automatron, Far Harbor, Nuka-World, and the Workshop expansions. Whether you’re building settlements, battling robots, or exploring the mysteries of the Commonwealth, every adventure is here.

But that’s not all! The Anniversary Edition also bundles over 150 pieces of Creation Club content, including fan favorites and previously unreleased items designed to enhance your journey. From new weapons and different Dogmeat breeds like a husky or a Dalmatian, to gameplay tweaks and quest expansions, there’s something for every Vault Dweller.

Celebrate a decad
title: Fallout 4: Anniversary Edition - Reveal Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
Watch the tailor-made animated launch trailer for The Lonesome Guild, out now on Xbox Series X|S! 

Get the game now: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/the-lonesome-guild/9mvw0kf7s32b

The Lonesome Guild is an ARPG all about togetherness, developed by Tiny Bull Studios and published by DON'T NOD. 

As a creeping mist spreads corrupting all in its path, you must gather a ragtag party of six misfits, each with unique abilities, stories, and struggles. Lead them and become fearsome friends on a quest to defeat loneliness. Seamlessly switch between them in battle and exploration to forge bonds that unlock powerful combos and heartfelt moments by the campfire - the stronger your bonds, the stronger the party. 

There's something for everyone - from a touching story and great characters, to challenging dynamic real-time combat with character switching and deadly combos.

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR 

FOLLOW XBOX 
https://twitter.com/xbox 
https://www.facebook.com/xbox 
https://
title: The Lonesome Guild - Launch Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
From the mech cockpit to crops - fight, farm, and forge a new life - Bounty Star is Out Now

Xbox Series X|S: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/bounty-star/9P66TM1HLGLX/0010

Bounty Star is an over-the-shoulder 3D action game that marries mech combat and customization with farming and base building. The player takes on the role of a broken but powerful ex-soldier named Clem, a war veteran, talented fighter and expert mech pilot. Clem attempts to shed the guilt and shame of her past and become a legitimate force for good in the Red Expanse, a post-post-apocalyptic version of the American Southwest.

© 2025 Bone Wallet, LLC. Developed by Dinogod LLC. Published by Annapurna Interactive. All rights reserved.

author: Xbox
description:
Get ready to hit the road again! Truck Driver: The Dutch Connection arrives October 31 2025, bringing a brand-new story, Dutch-inspired landscapes, and exciting new challenges for every dedicated trucker out there. Explore new routes, meet fresh faces, and experience what it truly means to be a truck driver in the heart of Europe. From scenic countryside roads to bustling industrial zones, every delivery counts!
